did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Subject files many of Henry W. Jeffers III, vice president of the company.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Subject files concerning fertilizer, milk products, and advertising; financial reports; minutes; alphabetical files, many of Henry W. Jeffers III, vice president of the company, including appointment calendars, cash payments and receipts, payrolls, reports, photographs, and other records.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Files pertaining to Henry W. Jeffers II and Henry W. Jeffers III may be used only with permission from them or their heirs.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Walker-Gordon Laboratory Company Records, #3150. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
